A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe Last Jedi can be more awful than Force Awakens. Absolutely terrible\, plot is a mess and illogical\, no development for Rey's character\, Finn sidelined to background noise\, no explanation to why the 1st Order can become so powerful than the New Republic since the latter was victorious in Ep 6\, all the mythos set in previous episodes is thrown out of the window\, Luke's legacy destroyed in the most disrespectful manner.
